kw.name: New Browser
kw.doc: Create a new playwright Browser with specified options. See `Browser, Context and Page` for more information about Browser and related concepts.
kw.msg: {"browser": "chromium", "headless": true, "handleSIGINT": true, "handleSIGTERM": true, "handleSIGHUP": true, "timeout": 30000.0, "devtools": false, "slowMo": 0.0}
Successfully created browser with options: {"browser":"chromium","headless":true,"handleSIGINT":true,"handleSIGTERM":true,"handleSIGHUP":true,"timeout":30000,"devtools":false,"slowMo":0}

kw.name: New Page
kw.doc: Open a new Page. A Page is the Playwright equivalent to a tab. See `Browser, Context and Page` for more information about Page concept. Returns a stable identifier for the created page.
kw.msg: Successfully initialized new page object and opened url: about:blank

kw.name: Go To
kw.doc: Navigates to the given ``url``.
kw.msg: Succesfully opened URL https://theotokus-bodytest-web.herokuapp.com/

kw.name: Fill Text
kw.doc: Clears and fills the given ``text`` into the text field found by ``selector``.
kw.msg: Fills the text 'admin@bodytest.com' in the given field.

kw.name: Fill Text
kw.doc: Clears and fills the given ``text`` into the text field found by ``selector``.
kw.msg: Fills the text 'pwd123' in the given field.

kw.name: Click
kw.doc: Simulates mouse click on the element found by ``selector``.

kw.name: Get Text
kw.doc: Returns text attribute of the element found by ``selector``. See the `Finding elements` section for details about the selectors.

kw.name: Create Dictionary
kw.doc: Creates and returns a dictionary based on the given ``items``.
kw.msg: &{student} = { name=Edson José dos Santos | email=edson@theotokus.com | age=39 | weight=81 | feet_tall=1.82 }

kw.name: Remove Student
kw.msg: delete from students where email = 'edson@theotokus.com'

kw.doc: Simulates mouse click on the element found by ``selector``.

kw.name: Wait For Elements State
kw.doc: Waits for the element found by ``selector`` to satisfy state option.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Take Screenshot
kw.doc: Takes a screenshot of the current window and saves it to ``path``. Saves it as a png.

kw.msg: &{student} = { name=Ricardo de Mauro | email=ricardo@theotokus.com | age=34 | weight=98 | feet_tall=1.75 }

kw.name: Insert Student
kw.msg: delete from students where email = 'ricardo@theotokus.com'
insert into students(name, email, age, weight, feet_tall, created_at, updated_at)values('Ricardo de Mauro','ricardo@theotokus.com',34,98,1.75,NOW(),NOW());
